title: Google’s LG Nexus 5 (2015) could be here sooner than we thought | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexus 619]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * First off, it’s been widely reported that Google is working on a second Nexusdevice with Chinese manufacturer Huawei.That’s tipped to be landing as a [Nexus6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-nexus-6-2015-release-date-rumours-news-specs-price), although it’s reported to feature a 5.67-inchdisplay – that’s smaller than the 5.9-inch screen on last year’s [Nexus6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review).   **  Related:[Android 6.0 Marshmallowfeatures](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-features)**There’s also [more recent talk](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/claimed-google-nexus-8-tablet-dummy-unit-leaks) of a Nexus tablet being in the works,specifically the Nexus 8.The Nexus 8 was originally rumoured to launch last year, following on from the2nd-gen Nexus 7. Instead, however, Google launched a Nexus 9, skipping an8-inch device.We still don’t have any information regarding the manufacturer of the mootedNexus 8 however, so it’s tough to make any guesses as to the device’s specs ordesign.Do you think Google is going to unveil three Nexus devices on September 29?Let us know in the comments.   **  Check out our smartphone group test video below:**
